description:
Whether on land or sea, these lightweight shorts are good to go. The Level Six Slanted shorts are ready for SUP paddles, surf sessions, or your next game of frolf.

  • Updated with a recycled poly' blend that dries quickly and has plenty of stretch
  • Waist drawcord secures the fit
  • Zippered fly and inner Lycra gusset means no more time fighting with a Velcro fly
  • Zippered rear pocket secure keys and small valuables
name: Level Six Slanted Boardshorts - Men's
